headline: Stifel Initiates Leidos (LDOS) Coverage with “Buy” Rating and $178 Price Target
summary: Leidos Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:LDOS) is one of the 10 undervalued tech stocks flying under Wall Street’s radar. On June 23, Stifel Nicolaus issued a “Buy” rating for Leidos after resuming coverage of the company. The firm also set a price target of $178. Stifel described Leidos as a “well-diversified” government services contractor. The analysts also […]
